basics.name: Senior Commercial Business Banking Relationship Manager, VP
basics.label: Business Management
basics.summary: To maximize my exceptional management, retail, business banking and analytical talent, in a capacity that presents sales development and project management opportunities.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Senior Commercial Business Banking Relationship Manager, VP
work.summary: Responsible for generating, managing, and expanding profitable loans and deposit portfolios. Servicing all commercial business client relationships, including processing of credit requests. Participates in civic, business and community affairs.
highlights: Reduced Bank costs by 11% and increased corporate client retention in 1st and 2nd quarter.
Exceeded Treasury Management Goals each quarter by 115% - 129%
Exceeded loan goal by 50% while managing a portfolio of over 100 clients
Completed and facilitated bank proposals and presentations

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Sr. Business Banking Treasury Management Officer, Vice President & Senior Business Banker
work.summary: Dual role that combined Treasury Management and Business Banking duties. Responsible for the sale of Treasury Management services, creating presentations, training, and coaching.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Commercial Business Banking Relationship Manager, Assistant Vice President
work.summary: Responsible for generation and management of a profitable loan and deposit portfolio, retaining and strengthening current relationships, and creatively providing credit solutions to bank clients.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Identified and sold TFCJ benefits to Select Employee Groups, developed strategic marketing plans, conducted on-site presentations, and created written proposals.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Proactively initiated, developed and managed long term profitable banking relationships while also managing branch operational needs.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and implemented Cash Management products for the Commercial Real Estate and Business Banking segment.
